about_the_game:
These are the music files for all the songs that appear in the game "Just an Ordinary Maintenance Check". This musical content will appear throughout JAOMC, however this soundtrack complies all of the music for listening at any point in time. 

Images of art, screenshots, and music notation will be included with the soundtrack for any whom are interested. 

The song list is as follows;

"Safe and Sound"

"It's Behind You"

"Cool and Collected"

"Under Fire"

"Under Pressure"

"The Host"

"The Blind Heretic"

"Unholy Host"

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the art and images included with the soundtrack contain a bit of blood and violence.
